trans-unit.source: To deploy the resources to Azure, you must be logged in to your Azure account and you must use the Azure Resource Manager module.
trans-unit.target: To deploy the resources to Azure, you must be logged in to your Azure account and you must use the Azure Resource Manager module.

trans-unit.source: To learn about using Azure Resource Manager with either Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, see:
trans-unit.target: To learn about using Azure Resource Manager with either Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, see:

trans-unit.target: <linkText>Using Azure PowerShell with Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Using the Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows with Azure Resource Management</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Using the Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows with Azure Resource Management</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The examples below assume you already have a resource group in your account with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: The examples below assume you already have a resource group in your account with the specified name.
